FuncDef: This command configures source IP address LI filter match criterion.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an address specified as dotted quad. Values-a.b.c.d.
Specifies eight 16-bit hexadecimal pieces representing bit match criteria. Values-1 to 32.
Any mask expressed in dotted quad notation. Values-0.0.0.0 to 255.255.255.255.
